summary: This document details the due diligence research conducted on the 2017 Caterpillar Trust as part of AML compliance. It outlines the results of various searches performed on the trust, indicating no significant negative media or legal issues found. The document emphasizes the importance of escalating any alerts related to politically exposed persons (PEPs) and ensuring compliance with legal standards.

persons.name: Priyanka Rathore
persons.context: Priyanka Rathore prepared the due diligence report and conducted the necessary searches for the 2017 Caterpillar Trust.

keyFacts: The due diligence research found no significant negative media results for the 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
All accounts involving politically exposed persons (PEPs) must be escalated according to compliance standards.
The document emphasizes the need for thorough searches in required databases as part of AML compliance.
No court cases or public records were found related to the 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
The document is marked confidential and is intended for internal use only.
